comments:
Using the latest code in head:

Try to open the Plug-in Development > Editors preference page, you get an NPE:

eclipse.buildId=unknown
java.version=1.5.0_03
java.vendor=Sun Microsystems Inc.
BootLoader constants: OS=win32, ARCH=x86, WS=win32, NL=en_US
Framework arguments:  -product org.eclipse.sdk.ide -pdelaunch
Command-line arguments:  -product org.eclipse.sdk.ide -data D:\Eclipse\UpdatedSource\plugins/../runtime-EclipseApplication -dev file:D:/Eclipse/UpdatedSource/plugins/.metadata/.plugins/org.eclipse.pde.core/Documentation/dev.properties -pdelaunch -os win32 -ws win32 -arch x86
